Polygon Deprecated.
Quad Umm.
Ray  
Triangle Represents a physical 3D triangle A Triangle MUST be constructed with exactly 3 defined Vec3's.
Vec2 An efficient vector representation of a 2D point.
Vec3 Describes a Vector of size 3 that is a 3 Dimensional vector
Vec4 Represents a Quaternion
Vector Deprecated.
Vertex It's a 3D point for making shapes.
